ratings.comment: Great professor! The stories are interesting reads! I would recommend this class to anyone! Grade is based on 4 papers, a presentation, participation, mandatory attendance and a final. Recommend!! He's awesome.

One of the best professors I have ever had.  He is always availalbe during office hours to review questions.  He is extreamly kind and helpful.  He takes a vested interest in the sucess of his students.  He wrote me a GREAT letter of rec. for grad school.
Very easy class.  Interesting if you want it to be.  Prof. Bickner really knows his stuff so his lectures are personal and interesting.

Overall Prof. Bickner is a really nice and friendly guy. I'd say his class is rather easy but boring at times. However, he has a pretty high expectations when it comes to your work. See him during office hours and he will definitely help you. Don't forget to PARTICIPATE ACTIVELY in discussions!!
